p: Next, we tested whether Tip60 also restricted infection of adult flies. Indeed, we depletion of Tip60 using in vivo RNAi led to decreased survival of flies challenged with WNV-KUN and VSV but did not impact survival of unchallenged animals ( Figure S4Eâ€“G in Text S1 ). Thus, the Tip60 complex also has antiviral roles in vivo.
